thread.title: 'Maybe you'll get border back' Eurocrat says Calais refugees could come to UK after Brexit
thread.title_full: 'Maybe you'll get border back' Eurocrat says Calais refugees could come to UK after Brexit

title: 'Maybe you'll get border back' Eurocrat says Calais refugees could come to UK after Brexit
text:
'Maybe you'll get border back' Eurocrat says Calais refugees could come to UK after Brexit 'Maybe you'll get border back' Eurocrat says Calais refugees could come to UK after Brexit A FRENCH MEP has warned refugees in Calais could arrive in the UK following Brexit as part of a “future negotiation”. PUBLISHED: 11:00, Wed, Feb 15, 2017 | UPDATED: 11:07, Wed, Feb 15, 2017 
Sylvie Goulard, of the Democratic Movement, said France and Britain would have to look at the issue during negotiations “without emotion” after the Calais Jungle refugee camp was disbanded in October. 
Speaking to BBC Essex’s Sadie Nine , she said the way refugees looking to the UK were processed could change following Britain’s divorce from the European bloc. 
“We have to find a better solution,” she said. “The refugees, including the minors, in France want to go to the UK. 
“I don’t know if in the future after the UK has left the European Union , the way we handle these people in France will be the same, it will be part of the future negotiation.” GETTY Sylvie Goulard has warned the UK's border arrangements could change after Brexit Related articles
